products.description: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Designed with a retro-inspired embroidered archive logo, this crewneck sweatshirt features a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Cut in a relaxed fit with fine ribbed knit trim.
products.title: Fleece Crewneck sweatshirt

products.description: Crafted from soft cotton blend fleece, this crewneck sweatshirt offers exceptional comfort with added warmth. Styled with long sleeves and designed with drop shoulders for a relaxed fit. Finished with archive-inspired logo embroidery at the upper chest.
products.title: Fleece Cropped Sweatshirt

products.description: Crafted from an extra soft cotton blend fleece, this sweatshirt offers a cozy feel. Designed with a quarter-zip closure and a mockneck. Features ribbed texture at the collar, cuffs, and hem. Styled with a kangaroo pocket at the front and finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest.
products.title: Fleece Quarter Zip Sweatshirt

products.description: Styled in an oversized silhouette, this crewneck sweatshirt is made with drop shoulders for a relaxed fit. Crafted from a cotton fleece blend for soft, plush comfort. Detailed with banded cuffs at the sleeve openings and features a CK monogram logo design at the front.
products.title: Relaxed Crewneck Sweatshirt

products.description: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Designed with a retro-inspired embroidered archive logo, this hoodie sweatshirt features a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Cut in a relaxed fit with a fine ribbed knit trim.
products.title: Fleece Hoodie

products.description: Crafted from an extra soft cotton blend fleece, this sweatshirt offers a cozy feel. Designed with a quarter-zip closure and a mockneck. Features ribbed texture at the collar, cuffs, and hem. Styled with a kangaroo pocket at the front and finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest.
products.title: Quarter Zip Sweatshirt

products.description: Crafted from a cotton and recycled polyester blend, this sweatshirt is made with reduced environmental impact and soft comfort in mind. Designed with long sleeves and a mock neck. Cut with a boxy fit for a slightly oversized silhouette.
products.title: Mock Neck Sweatshirt

products.description: Shaped in a boxy silhouette, this hoodie is designed with logo tape styling along the upper sleeves and a zip closure along the front. Made with ribbed detailing at the cuffs and hem. Crafted from a recycled polyester blend for reduced environmental impact.
products.title: Open Zip Hoodie

products.description: A modern cotton zip hoodie crafted with cotton stretch fabric, classic logo styling and ribbed knit detailing for a youthful, sporty design.
products.title: Modern Cotton Stretch Zip Sleep Hoodie

products.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a polo collar. Finished with ribbed detailing at the hem and the sleeve cuffs.
products.title: Extra Fine Black Sweater

products.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a polo collar. Finished with ribbed detailing at the hem and the sleeve cuffs.
products.title: Extra Fine Maroon Sweater

products.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Finished with ribbed detailing along the sleeve cuffs and hem.

products.description: Crafted from a fine merino wool blend, this sweater is designed with a lightweight construction featuring a soft, refined touch. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Finished with ribbed detailing along the sleeve cuffs and hem.

products.description: An updated take on the classic cable knit sweater, this top is designed with a cropped length. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Detailed with wide ribbed styling for added dimension and texture.
